articles.title: Man dies of coronavirus on his 30th birthday, 9 days after his mother - Global News
articles.description: Thomas Martins died shortly after his school sang him 'Happy Birthday' via video call.
articles.content:
A New Jersey mother and son died of the novel coronavirus within nine days of each other.
Thomas Martins, who had Down syndrome, was meant to be blowing out the candles on April 6, his 30th birthday. He succumbed to COVID-19 that day.

articles.title: Pregnant NHS nurse dies after testing positive for coronavirus but baby saved - Evening Standard
articles.content:
A 28-year-old pregnant nurse has died after testing positive for coronavirus.
Mary Agyeiwaa Agyapong, who worked as a nurse on a general ward at Luton and Dunstable University Hospital, died on Sunday.
